column1: text
What are some red flags that the culture at a company you're interviewing with is toxic?
How can you tell whether you're in love with someone or just in love with the idea of being in love?
How (and why) did you and your SO choose which side of the bed you'd sleep on? Do you ever regret your decision?
Women who agreed with their SO to makeup a different story of how you two met when explaining to friends and family, how did you two REALLY meet?
A common stereotype is men 'protecting' women - but have you ever been in a situation where you 'protected' a male from something/someone? What's your story?
What weird things has a doctor said to you regarding your body?

Have you ever been a late bloomer's first girlfriend? How did it work out?


Has anyone ever been the first girlfriend of someone who started dating late? How old were you guys?

Was it challenging? Were there any benefits?
A lot of people are really insecure about their bodies, hair, face, etc. But what is the best thing you have ever heard that’s made you feel really good about yourself?

What are your toxic traits?

What is the worst thing you’ve ever said to your SO?
When has someone betrayed or cheated on you, when you NEVER in a million years would have thought they’d be the type of person to do that?

What's the angriest you've been at your partner? Why? How did you act and how did you calm yourself down?

Ladies who have faced emotional/mental abuse in the past and overcame it, what would you recommend to someone who needs to cope with it?


Also, I'm super proud of every single one of you who has made it past anything upsetting. More power to all of us! <3

As opposed to one person picking it out and the other being totally surprised?

What makes it awesome?

I'm thinking of getting having laser removal done and I'd love to know you got on with it or something similar.
What do you wish was more socially acceptable?
